honors_and_awards.title: GenAI Hackathon - National Top 10
honors_and_awards.description: – Implemented Sharma.JI, personalized education Telegram bot, to address tutor shortcomings and language barriers – Leveraged OpenAI API integration, rectifying root causes of mistakes and redefining education with tailored tutoring

honors_and_awards.title: Smart India Hackathon 2022 - National Winner
honors_and_awards.description: – Developed a fully automated algorithm to quickly stitch multiple adjacent satellite images to create a seamless mosaic – Implemented image blending techniques with OpenCV and enhanced performance using machine learning and GP-GAN

honors_and_awards.title: EXL™ Hackathon - International Winner
honors_and_awards.description: – Created a Cloud-Agnostic Storage Solution with easy Programmatic Access, file backup, and cloud recommendation – Built a robust backend using Express.js, MongoDB in the database, and secured the application with JWT authentication

honors_and_awards.title: Narcotics Control Bureau Darkathon 2022 - National Top 30
honors_and_awards.publication: Narcotics Control Bureau & Cyber Peace Foundation
honors_and_awards.description: – Devised algorithm to extract entities amidst semi-structured from Dark Web data using Scrapy and word2Vec tokenizer – Formulated Random Forest model with 10,000 entities-data, achieving 92% accuracy and identifying Indian drug trafficker

honors_and_awards.title: Rakathon'22 / Code The Future - International Top 100
honors_and_awards.description: – Designed a dark themed website using React, Flask with Socket.io for backend and TensorFlow for machine learning – Trained Computer Vision model and Speech Recognition model to detect Sign Language to predict text and vice-versa

honors_and_awards.title: MBRDI HackStar - National Winner
honors_and_awards.description: – Optimized mobile charging and integrated payment solutions for electric vehicles to enhance EV infrastructure in the city – Implemented slot booking for EV charging using Node.js, MongoDB and GoogleMapsAPI to book the nearest station’s slot
